message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I understand your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $115.  It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still not able to pay more than $95 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
